title: Topic 001 Question 010
body: A company uses Azure Site Recovery for their on-premises Hyper-V servers. The company manages servers by using System Center Virtual Machine Manager (SCVMM).
An administrator reports that replication to the secondary site has failed.
You need to inspect the SCVMM logs and configuration files.
Which PowerShell cmdlets should you use? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
